name: Kenshi
description: A script for the web version from their Forum. Click here to download.
notes: Seems to have no installer this way, still testing all dependencies seem to been installed. Manual copy Kenshie's unpacked files in drive_c/Program Files for now.

files.zip: N/A:Select kenshi_1.0.7.zip downloaded from the torrent

task.name: winetricks
task.app: corefonts ogg physx vcrun2005 vcrun2008 vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015

content:
files:
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
- zip: N/A:Select kenshi_1.0.7.zip downloaded from the torrent
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Kenshi/kenshi_x64.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts ogg physx vcrun2005 vcrun2008 vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472 win7
    arch: win64
    description: Have patience while we install .NET 4.7.2.
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Kenshi
    file: zip
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
